mainText: We would like to extend our warmest thanks to Dorothy McElroy who completed her stint as Chair of T.P.S. last night, and also to Sheila Fazal who stood down from our board of directors. Thank you both for all your hard work.
We're currently recruiting for 31 posts around Scotland. If you're looking for a change, check out our recruitment portal. Go to www.turningpointscotland.com to find out more.
